app.title: Bytedesk API Docs
auth.loginDescription: Login with username and password, returns access token and user information
auth.bearerTokenDescription: REST API requests require Bearer Token in request headers
auth.accessTokenDescription: Some interfaces support AccessToken login for web redirect scenarios
auth.loginMethodMobileDesc: Use mobile number as login credential
user.profileDescription: Get detailed personal information of the currently logged-in user, including basic profile and settings, requires authentication
message.sendDescription: Send text, images, files and other types of messages
home.title: Bytedesk API Documentation
home.description: Complete API reference for integrating with Bytedesk services
home.welcome: Welcome to the Bytedesk API documentation. This documentation will help you get started with our powerful API for building customer service and communication solutions, especially our leading AI large model conversation capabilities.
home.apiOverview: The Bytedesk API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints for managing customer support, messaging, and communication workflows. Our RESTful API is designed to be developer-friendly with consistent response formats and detailed error messages. Particularly noteworthy is our integrated AI large model conversation capability, supporting multimodal interaction and multi-vendor integration.
home.modules.authDesc: User login, registration, token refresh and other authentication functions
home.modules.userDesc: User information query, creation and management functions
home.modules.messageDesc: Send text, images, files and other types of messages
home.modules.ticketDesc: Create and query customer service tickets
home.modules.aiDesc: Powerful AI conversation capabilities with multimodal interaction and multi-vendor integration
ai.title: AI Large Model Conversation
ai.description: Bytedesk integrates advanced AI large model conversation features to provide intelligent customer service and communication solutions
ai.multimodal.title: Multimodal Conversation Support
ai.multimodal.description: Support intelligent conversation interactions with text, images, videos, files and other formats
ai.multimodal.textDesc: Intelligent text conversation with contextual semantic understanding
ai.multimodal.imageDesc: Image content recognition, analysis and Q&A
ai.multimodal.videoDesc: Video content understanding and intelligent summarization
ai.multimodal.fileDesc: Document parsing, summarization and intelligent Q&A
ai.providers.title: Multi-Vendor Large Model Integration
ai.providers.description: Support integration with mainstream domestic and international large model providers, flexible selection of the most suitable AI capabilities
ai.providers.deepseekDesc: DeepSeek's advanced reasoning and code generation capabilities
ai.providers.zhipuDesc: Zhipu AI GLM series multimodal large models
ai.providers.openaiDesc: OpenAI GPT series powerful general AI capabilities
ai.providers.alibabaDesc: Alibaba Cloud Bailian large model service platform
ai.knowledge.title: Third-Party Knowledge Base Integration
ai.knowledge.description: Seamlessly integrate with mainstream knowledge base platforms to build professional intelligent Q&A systems
ai.knowledge.ragflowDesc: RAG engine based on deep document understanding
security.useHttps: Use HTTPS to transmit sensitive information
notes.saveToken: Access tokens need to be properly saved
notes.tokenExpiry: Need to re-login or refresh when token expires
notes.currentUserOnly: Can only get information of currently logged-in user
